fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Apply 2 phases of Regeneration. Takes effect next phase. Prevents Poisoned this phase. Takes 1 phase off existing Poisoned status.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
Apply 5 phases of Regeneration. Takes effect at the **end of the phase**. Prevents Poisoned this phase. Takes 3 phases off existing Poisoned status.

*Stackable. Read <#1191650444594909354> for more information on player statuses.*
